dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 786 RH: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Pecos Division of the Western District of Texas, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tony Gonzales of Texas (for himself, Mr. Larsen of Washington, and Ms. DelBene) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Pecos Division of the Western District of Texas, and for other purposes.

subsection.header: Pecos Division of the Western District of Texas
subsection.text: Section 124(d)(6) of title 28, United States Code, is amended, in the matter preceding paragraph (7), by inserting and Alpine after Pecos.
Section 128(b) of title 28, United States Code, is amended by inserting Mount Vernon, after Tacoma,.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
